name: FreeStyle Mania
description:
4k mania game where you can play any song, record your own notes. Rewind and try to match your original notes! How do I play it tho?
  1. Click play
  2. Click browse and choose a folder with mp3 files. (the files don't show up)
  3. XCNM to play notes
  4. R to rewind
  • arrows to change song
  • L to open song loader
  • Esc to quit
What do I need to play it?
  • Computer
  • Windows OS (XP or better maybe)
  • MP3 files, preferably songs but any MP3 will do
  • Keyboard
  • Mouse
  • Brains probably
  • Patience
  • Time
Oh nice! What kind of features does it have?
  • Lotta bugs, lotta weirdness, lotta missing stuff.
  • Bad animations, idk how to use unity animation.
What is the game missing?
  • Sliders
  • Speed settings
  • Keybind settings
  • Bug fixes
  • Animations
  • Recording layers
  • Multiplayer (local, scoreboards, profiles)
  • Replays
  • Music service integration
LOL can I do something similar?
  • Yea ofc why not.
  • My code is a spaghetti mess so I recommend starting fresh.
  • Do message me if you make something similar, I wanna see.

Special thanks to Unity docs + Answers, NAudio, SFB etc. etc. you know.
